p: Consequently, investigations into the feasibility of this third option should focus on identification of suitable patches of future habitat within protected areas, as well as constraints on seed dispersal by target species, and possible negative consequences to the receiving ecosystem (especially the potential for hybridization). Option 3 would be the riskiest of the potential actions outlined here, and investigation into its feasibility would need to be undertaken with a commensurately high degree of caution. We include this option in order to stimulate discussion, not as an endorsement.
